content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)
Consists of a BurnerMiningDrill at position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a Chest at position (x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Coal mine at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
Consists of a BurnerMiningDrill at position (x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a Chest at position (x=43.5, y=-82.5)

### Furnace group at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of multiple Furnaces at positions (x=40.0, y=-82.0), (x=45.0, y=-83.0), (x=42.0, y=-81.0), (x=45.0, y=-80.0), (x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of a SteamEngine at position (x=10.5, y=10.5), a Boiler at position (x=-6.0, y=24.5), and an OffshorePump at position (x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a Lab with lab_input={'automation-science-pack': 67}

### Inserter group at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (x=3.5, y=0.5) and a Chest at position (x=2.5, y=0.5)

### Inserter group at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (x=0.5, y=3.5) and a Chest at position (x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into full inventories
- Make sure the inventory of the entity is not full before attempting to insert items
### Errors when using entities with no fuel
- Ensure that the entity has sufficient fuel before using it
### Errors when using entities with no input liquid
- Make sure the entity has a sufficient input liquid before using it
### Errors when using entities with no fluid present in connections
- Ensure that the entity has a fluid present in its connections before using it
### Errors when chest at drop position is full
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining or other activities
### Errors when no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the Furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt before using it
### Errors when no research in progress
- Ensure that the Lab has a research in progress before using it
### Errors when no fluid present in fluid box
- Ensure that the entity has a fluid present in its fluid box before using it
### Errors when out of fuel
- Ensure that the entity has sufficient fuel before using it
### Errors when chest is full
- Empty the chest to continue using it
